#  Identity Verification Solutions

##  Don't fight identity fraud without us.

Know and trust your customers online with the **AI-driven identity
verification** platform trusted by leading brands worldwide.

Learn More

### 1B+

transactions processed

### 5k+

ID types in over 200 countries and territories

### 500+

best-in-class global data sources

### World’s LEADING

data scientists building cutting-edge Al and ML models

##  Identity verification that’s easy on customers, tough on fraud.

Tap into 360-degree insights plus data, tools and analytics to fight fraud at
the speed of business.

Discover Jumio Solutions

##### Verify

Verify identities and detect fraud throughout the customer lifecycle – from
onboarding to ongoing monitoring.

Explore Identity Verification

##### Predict

Gain predictive fraud insights and in-the-moment risk analysis based on past
and present behavior data, along with recognized fraud patterns and risk
signals.

Learn About Risk Signals

##### Orchestrate

Deliver dynamic user experiences based on each customer’s verified identity
and risk profile, allowing real customers to proceed without disruption.

See How It Works

Trusted by  
global brands

Advanced Analytics Dashboard

##  Access all Jumio services in one place

Whether reviewing real-time analytics, investigating transactions or updating
rules, you can mitigate risk on your terms using our Unified Portal.

Learn More

Self-Service Rules Editor

##  Adjust business logic in real time

  * Instantly respond to evolving threats without writing code
  * Choose from hundreds of professionally optimized, pre-configured rules to simplify and accelerate your fraud defense strategy
  * Easily configure rules based on your unique requirements

Learn More

Streamlined Investigation

##  Drill down into identity transactions

  * View full details of a suspicious scan in a single comprehensive view without wasting time compiling data
  * Easily approve or reject a transaction

###### Details include:

  * Overall risk score 
  * Checks evaluated
  * Detailed descriptions of flagged issues

Learn More

Orchestration and Risk Scoring

##  Tailor your workflows and make decisions faster

  * Build powerful, risk-based workflows that meet your exact business needs
  * Simplify decision-making with dynamic, customizable risk scoring 
  * Harness industry-leading risk signals from multiple vendors — all from a single platform

Learn More

###  See how Jumio can help you win.

This quick video shows how Jumio can help you:

  * Onboard more good customers by delivering a low-friction user experience
  * Prevent fraud and financial crime on your platform
  * Protect the reputation of your brand 

Watch the Video

###  The Global Identity Standard Across All Industries

Leading brands across industries count on Jumio to stay ahead of fraud in
order to help protect their customers, profits and reputations from the damage
that happens when you fail to know your customers online.

# Total Cost of Ownership Calculator

Use this calculator to find out how much your online identity verification
solution is REALLY costing you.

### TCO Calculator

#### Planning Assumptions

Current number of online identity verifications performed each day

Percent of manual reviews as a result of verification "maybes"

Incremental number of daily manual reviews caused by "maybes"

30

Average time spent on each manual review (in minutes)

Total time required for incremental reviews (in hours per day)

5

#### Verification Costs:

Cost per identity verification

Annual identity verification costs

$45,625

#### Manual Review Costs:

Average salary of manual reviewer

Incremental staffing cost for incremental manual review (per year)

$28,125

#### Estimated Opportunity Costs (from customer abandonment):

Estimated abandonment rate

Estimated customer's lifetime value

Number of customers who abandon each year

780

Estimated annual lost revenue from abandonment

$780,000

Total cost of ownership for online identity verification per year

$853,750

## What's Behind the Numbers?

The growth of the online identity verification market has introduced a number
of automated solutions that rely on optical character recognition (OCR) and
basic machine learning to determine if an ID is authentic or the consumer’s
digital identity is legitimate.

WIthout the right technology behind them, automated solutions can present a
number of shortcomings:

  * Poor verification accuracy (i.e., too many false positives)
  * Return too many “suspect” decisions (aka “maybes”)
  * More maybes lead to more manual reviews
  * More manual reviews lead to more frustration and abandonment

Some automated solutions can cause more legitimate customers to be erroneously
denied, triggering greater frustration, customer dissatisfaction and online
abandonment. This costs you time having to perform manual reviews.

## Get Started

Let a Jumio expert show you how easy it can be to integrate our automated
identity proofing solutions into your existing processes.

Request a Conversation
